name: CustomDropdownKit
summary: A customizable dropdown library for iOS supporting UIKit and SwiftUI.
description:
CustomDropdownKit is a powerful and flexible dropdown library for iOS that supports:
- UIKit and SwiftUI
- Single and multi-selection
- Anchor-based positioning (UITextField, UIButton, or any UIView)
- Keyboard-aware positioning
- Highly customizable appearance
- Production-ready with comprehensive configuration options
